code: import{FOLLOW_TOGGLE,FOLLOWER,UNFOLLOWER,GET_FOLLOWERS,GET_FOLLOWINGS,IS_FOLLOWING,FOLLOWING,UNFOLLOWING,REMOVE_FAVOURITES,GET_USER_STATS,GET_USERS_TO_RECOMMEND,REMOVE_RECOMMADATION}from'./types';import{dispatchHelper}from'../utils/utils';export var isFollowing=function isFollowing(username){return dispatchHelper(IS_FOLLOWING,'is-following',{username:username});};export var getUserStats=function getUserStats(username){return dispatchHelper(GET_USER_STATS,'get-user-stats',{username:username});};export var getFollowers=function getFollowers(user){return dispatchHelper(GET_FOLLOWERS,'get-followers',{user:user});};export var getFollowings=function getFollowings(user){return dispatchHelper(GET_FOLLOWINGS,'get-followings',{user:user});};export var getUsersToRecommend=function getUsersToRecommend(user){return dispatchHelper(GET_USERS_TO_RECOMMEND,'get-users-to-recommend',{user:user});};export var toggleFollow=function toggleFollow(f){return{type:FOLLOW_TOGGLE,payload:f};};export var Follower=function Follower(follower){return{type:FOLLOWER,payload:follower};};export var Unfollower=function Unfollower(unfollower){return{type:UNFOLLOWER,payload:unfollower};};export var Following=function Following(following){return{type:FOLLOWING,payload:following};};export var Unfollowing=function Unfollowing(unfollowing){return{type:UNFOLLOWING,payload:unfollowing};};export var removeFavourites=function removeFavourites(fav_id){return{type:REMOVE_FAVOURITES,payload:fav_id};};export var removeRecommandation=function removeRecommandation(recommend_id){return{type:REMOVE_RECOMMADATION,payload:recommend_id};};
